news_header: The Nobel Prize winners for Physics and Medicine have been announced, with a focus on machine learning and gene regulation.
news_text: On Thursday, the Nobel Prize winners will be revealed, including the Peace Prize in Oslo. This year's Nobel Prize in Physics was awarded to researchers Hopfield and Hinton for their groundbreaking work in machine learning through artificial neural networks. Hinton expressed surprise at the recognition, highlighting the transformative impact of AI on society, comparable to the industrial revolution. The Nobel Prize in Medicine went to Victor Am.s and Gary Ruvkun for their research on micro-RNA and gene regulation. The award ceremony will take place in December, where winners will receive medals and a cash prize.
